review: Exceeds expectations! I bought this on a whim. I'd previously been viewing  Amazon content from my iPad via AirPlay to an Apple TV. This streamlined my process. I bought a TVpower 1 amp USB cord to power it. Was warned at setup that power was low but ignored it. Works great and one less cord draped down my articulated TV arm.
author: John Peterson

review: I love this! No more small screens when watching my favorite shows.
author: Ann Parris "Health Conscious"

review: I have had the Fire TV Stick for months now and have only used it a handful of times.  Despite the Fire TV Stick being in the same room as my router, it consistently drops wifi, stalls to buffer, or says it has lost the connection.  I have two Roku's in rooms much further away from the Fire TV and they have never had any wifi issues (nor have my iPad or laptop).  I've tried everything I've seen online from changing wifi channels, to factory resets of my device, I am giving up on the Fire TV.
author: C. Boston
